name: Nature Coral Island - Nua Island
description:
We have to bring a tent, which helps us to sleep on the beach and look up to the sky where the stars are leading fishermen in the ocean. 

This place is total nature where there is no human impact, your job is laying down on the sunny sand, jumping to the crystal clear water and watch the incredible coral jungle like a heaven under water and self-prepare your seafood with locals

At night, no electric available, therefore we will make a camp fire, bqq fishes, squids, echinuses and listen to the stories of the local fishermen. All of them are nature as it is!
